text: To Each His Own is a 1946 American drama romance movieVariety film review; March 13, 1946, page 10.Harrison's Reports film review; March 16, 1943, page 43. directed by Mitchell Leisen and starring Olivia de Havilland. The screenplay was written by Charles Brackett and Jacques Th√©ry. The movie is about a young woman who gives birth to a child out of wedlock and has to give him up. De Havilland won the Academy Award for Best Actress. Brackett was nominated for Best Writing, Original Story. The title song became a hit. ==References== Category:1946 drama movies Category:1946 romance movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mitchell Leisen
title: To Each His Own (movie)
